pli-tv-bu-vb-sk42:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk42:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhuñjamānā sabbaṁ hatthaṁ mukhe pakkhipanti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk42:1.3.1: “Na bhuñjamāno sabbaṁ hatthaṁ mukhe pakkhipissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk42:1.4: Na bhuñjamānena sabbo hattho mukhe pakkhipitabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk42:1.5: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca bhuñjamāno sabbaṁ hatthaṁ mukhe pakkhipati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
